name: My Sharona
description: Fruity cocktails needn't be sweet; this raspberry-rum cocktail from Kenneth McCoy of Ward III in NY is bright and quite tart.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces white rum, such as Brugal Extra Dry

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle raspberries in a mixing glass. Add ice, rum, lemon juice, and agave syrup. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass and top off with ginger beer. Stir gently before serving.
